data.title: 1-day quality hardening: CI gate + benchmark validity + reproducibility

data.body: Review completed against plan and diff. PASS. Implemented: CI workflow (.github/workflows/ci.yml), root scripts (test/dashboard:lint/dashboard:build/check), Scenario 2 checker bug fix requiring Gizmo-Z=0, deterministic --seed sampling in src/index.ts, and regression test src/tasks/scenarios.test.ts. Verification: bun run check passed (94 tests, dashboard build successful). Determinism check passed: identical scenario sample order for --seed=123 across two runs; different order for --seed=321. Known residual: dashboard lint currently fails with pre-existing 58 errors; lint is tracked as advisory job to preserve signal without blocking this 1-day gate.
